title: Print, "Ein façonirter Schreib-Tisch,… (Writing Desk and Chair)", ca. 1720
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
signed: In plate above lower edge of plate mark: Ich: Iacob Schübler: inv: del: Norimb: Ier. Wolff exc. Aug: Vind: C.P.S.C.M. Iohann Ballthasar Probst direxit.
inscribed:
In plate below image: 
Ein façonirter Schreib-Tisch, nach der neuen bequemen manier, nebst /
einem Frantzöischen Commod stuhl, daran die Lehne nach der höhle des /
menschlichen Ruckens ausgefüttert, und mit einer Strebfeder versehen ist, da(s)s / 
die Lehne im hintersich biegen wohl nach geben aber nicht brechen kan.

In plate lower right of image in margin: 1.

recto: in graphite lower left in margin: IV /NT  / H [illeg.]
verso: in graphite lower left: inx / 421/3 (inscribed with a circle)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of the Estate of David Wolfe Bishop
description: An elaborate writing desk is featured in a draped corner of a room with a bookshelf on the left and a window at right. Ornamented with globes at left and right, the desk features four sections with multiple drawers at the base, as well as a central cartouche shaped drawered section above. Decorated with swags, festoons, heavy architectural mouldings and surmounted by an astrolabe, this central section holds a candle, writing materials and a book rest above a slanted writing board. An equally elaborate chair is placed in front of the desk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Ein façonirter Schreib-Tisch,… (Writing Desk and Chair)", ca. 1720.
ca. 1720. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of the Estate of David Wolfe Bishop. 1957-162-2.
